  • Unlock buyer contact information

  • Set more face-to-face meetings

  • Get alerted to buyer behavior

  • Get insights where they are most actionable

Build a list of target accounts

Find every account in your territorry that meets your ICP which is not actively being worked or is not yet in Salesforce.

"With all the new prospects that DataFox has uncovered, Rainforest QA was able to scale our outbound sales development team from 2 to 5 members."

-Jake Biskar, Head of Sales Development at Rainforest QA.

Stay engaged with top accounts

Easily monitor current prospects and customers with company signals and DataFox's unique conference participant intelligence.

Learn More

Next

Prioritize accounts with new opportunities

DataFox is the first platform that enables you to receive alerts on verified buying signals based on an account's status in Salesforce.

Learn More

Next

Complete pre-call research in minutes

Salespeople spend an average of 11 minutes on pre-call or presentation research. DataFox reduces research to 3 minutes with detailed company profiles.

Learn More

Next

Set more face-to-face meetings

Find out which conferences your prospects are participating in so you can get more face time.

"DataFox helped me discover that a prospect was attending an event. I connected with them on-site and ended up signing them as a customer. This happened three weeks after we bought DataFox."

Dasha Vasilyevich, Sales Development Manager

Learn More

Next

Stop manually updating Salesforce fields

Trust DataFox to automatically fill in and refresh Salesforce with verified account fields on leads, contacts, and accounts.

Compare the health of your database to others in the industry and receive personalized data recommendations from analysts.

Request Data Report

Next

Clean and enrich your entire database

Give marketing and sales teams the data foundation needed to succeed by cleaning and enriching your database.

"Accurate account data is critical to the success of any account-based strategy for territory planning, lead enrichment, and distribution. We use DataFox as a source of truth because the accuracy of their headcount and technology stack information."

David Aguilar, Director of Sales Ops at Invoca

Next

Automatically update your CRM

Get daily updates or changes to account information found by DataFox delivered to Salesforce.

Give sales the accounts they actually want to prospect. Determine your entire addressable market and break it down by territory in just seconds.

Next

Deliver reps company alerts by territory

Alert reps to valuable buying behavior in their territories. Chose from 68 of DataFox's categorized signals or customize your own.

"Our outbound reps used to spend over half their day on research and data input. With DataFox, our reps spend more time actually calling on prospects, with personalized messages that open doors to valuable conversations.In addition, our customer success managers know which clients to contact with the right message at the right time. Our productivity has gone way up!"

Casey Clegg, Sr. Director, Strategic Account Management

Steve Proffitt, Sr. Manager Corporate Development
